column3: Can I get an ACK from somebody else running 10.7 ?\nWhat happens on 10.7 if you don't set build_arch?\n

Build just fails because dependencies aren't present for i386.
See makefile.osx:

> CFLAGS=-mmacosx-version-min=10.5 -**arch i386** -O3 -Wno-invalid-offsetof -Wformat $(DEBUGFLAGS) $(DEFS) $(INCLUDEPATHS)
